lexs:DataItemContact.nc:OrganizationName: Georgia Bureau of Investigation, Violent Crimes Division

nc:Activity.nc:ActivityDescriptionText: The intoxicated subject became angry about a parking space. After shouting profanities, he struck the victim and proceeded to puncture the tires of the victim's vehicle.
